p: Extracts could be obtained as essential oil by-products, allowing a higher profitability, and where its moderate activity can be compensated by their safety. Besides that, essential oil taste is not neutral, and therefore its wide aroma should be carefully adapted to the matrices used in order to minimize the aromatic impact, and might also be used for food ingredient preservation before processing. Not least important to emphasize is that the finished products could also be marketed with the explicit mention of such natural preservatives to facilitate overall acceptance and demand. Further organoleptic studies should be performed, along with antimicrobial studies to assess the relevance of such ingredient in finished food products.
